summary: Now your Followers look more like hot slavic girls.
descriptionHtml:
New: Aela, Aranea, Lydia, Jenassa, Brelyn Maryon, Illia, Mjoll, Ria and Njada

Now they:
- are pretty (light skin and max. curvy like many slavic girls)
- have no NPC-level limitation (so they can be very powerfull if you got a high level)
- are Imperial, Nord or Redguard

Note:
- This mod is without the armour you see in the pics... The name of the armour is Dynasty ebony armour http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7270

Steps:
1. unpack the 7zip file
2. put ALL the files in your C:....Skyrim/Data Folder
3. Activate the mods via SkyrimLauncher or Nexus mod manager
4. Enjoy (and dont forget to comment if you like the NPCs)




P.s.

I really think they are all beautifull, but beauty is in the eye of the beholder, so I really dont care if YOU dont like them and its your problem. Just leave me alone.


Thx: foretrenty for his NPCeditor mod
author: Nero
